item.title: Personal Website Technical - Update 1
item.description: Today I was able to get this website up and running based on GitHub based workflow. I commit content markdown into GitHub, then I manually fire AWS codebuild. Build then picks up the source code of hugo project, runs Hugo, updates S3 bucket with static HTML. Things TODO Automate build based GitHub pull request Figure out images Organize content by Tags and Categories Create pages

item.title: Personal Website using Hugo, AWS S3
item.description: This is first post on my personal website which I developed using Hugo. This site hosted on AWS using S3 static web hosting.
